result.title: Programming Contest Series: Round 2
result.content:
Hi all,
We invite you to the second round of the Programming Contest Series.
This contest is primarily targeted at first year teams participating in ICPC. It is recommended that you participate as a team (your ICPC team).

Making Teams

  • Go to your profile page
  • Click on the tab "TEAMS", and click "Create new team"
  • Once you are done, you can use this team to register for the contest.

UPDATE The contest will start on Oct. 8, 20:00. It will have 7 problems, and will be 3 hours long.
Note: Registration opens 6 hours before the contest starts

UPDATE 2: The problems are in random order, not necessarily in increasing order of difficulty. Please read all the problems.
UPDATE 3: Contest will start at 20:30
Contest Registration Link

This round is being hosted by codelegend, superty, R.Arora and born2rule.

UPDATE 4 Contest is over. Problems will be discussed in a follow up meeting. Details will be informed later.
